From this screen you may:
  • Perform a search on a single author. Enter the author's name in the text field below, then click the search button to see which publications that author has worked on.
  • Perform a search on multiple authors. Enter the first author's name in the text field below, then click on the plus to add another author. Repeat until all of the authors have been specified, and then click the search button to see which publications these authors have collaborated on.
Tip: Use suggestions (displayed while you are typing in a box below the text field) to make sure you enter the author's name correctly.
